_sText: I'm finally mapping for Source again! This is probably my first source map in like, 2 years. It's a simple, COD4 inspired map I made to just fool around in, nothing to extravagant. I had to do a lot of re-compiling before this release. Also, I would have put HDR in, but every time I tried, the map would look terrible (Yes, I built my cubemaps. Once with HR on, and once with HDR off). So, I guess I'll just have to put HDR in my next releases. .nav, .bsp and .txt are packaged in the rar file. Also, cubemaps are built. Any issues, please tell me about. These can range from visual blemishes, to gameplay issues. Have fun.
